ThingDef.Name: LWM_Pallet
ThingDef.label: Pallet
ThingDef.description: A cheap, flat pallet for packing things. Does not protect against the weather. Difficult to manage if storing a variety of items.

ThingDef.label: Small Pallet
ThingDef.description: A cheap, flat pallet for packing things. Does not protect against the weather. Difficult to manage if storing a variety of items.

ThingDef.label: PalletRack
ThingDef.description: A large warehouse shelving unit complete with pallets which allows you to stack stacks of things. More organized and easier to use than plain old pallets and it's the only feasible way of stacking large items like stone chunks and even other buildings.

ThingDef.label: Skip
ThingDef.description: A large metal bin. Best for for storing big, heavy items unless you want to spend hours rooting around for that missing sock - it's easier to find when it's still attached to the body. These skips are not covered; they are open to the weather, but sturdier than a pallet.

ThingDef.Name: LWM_BigShelf
ThingDef.label: Wall shelves
ThingDef.description: Shelves attached to a wall for storing things. Looks nice and doesn't impede traffic.

ThingDef.Name: LWM_VeryBigShelf
ThingDef.label: Utility Racks
ThingDef.description: A fairly sturdy set of wire racks for storing things. More organized than pallets.

ThingDef.Name: DisplayCase
ThingDef.label: display case
ThingDef.description: A glass case for showing off your wares to guests.

ThingDef.label: Wicker basket
ThingDef.description: A woven container made typically of plant matierals, but may also be fashioned with synthetic ingredients. Can store just about anything, protects from the elements, and does well keeping fruits and veggies fresh by reducing spoilage by 30%.

ThingDef.label: barrel
ThingDef.description: A barrel made of wood or metal. Used to store various things inside, though easier to manage when it's all that same type of thing. Up to 5 items.

ThingDef.label: chest
ThingDef.description: A chest with compartments for quicker organization. Up to 6 items.

ThingDef.label: armored chest
ThingDef.description: An armored chest made of metal. Used to store various things inside. Up to 6 items.

ThingDef.label: Bin rack
ThingDef.description: A cabinet of bins with lids. They slide out and open with ease and are labelled for optimum organization. Lightning fast.

ThingDef.label: shed
ThingDef.description: An all purpose shed. You can store your tools, use it as a pantry, or hide the bodies. Has shelves and hangers for better organization. Slows spoilage by 25%.

ThingDef.label: pot
ThingDef.description: A big pot made of wood, metal or ceramics; used to preserve food. Slows rotting process by 40%.

ThingDef.Name: LWM_Meat_Hook
ThingDef.label: Meat Hook
ThingDef.description:
A tall metal frame with several hooks hanging from chains. A simple crank allows hoisting several hanging things into the air. A way to store the dead bodies of fellow animals you have killed, before cutting them up and consuming their flesh. You monster.
Note that you can only fit so many giant corpses into one space, even if you stack them. The frame will only hold so much weight.

ThingDef.label: feeding bowl
ThingDef.description: Your animals will love this bowl so much that they'll go eat out of here first!

ThingDef.label: Hamper
ThingDef.description: This is a smaller hamper made out of fabric with a lid for protecting the contents. On the glitterworlds, it's used for collecting dirty laundry, but out here on the Rim, it's more commonly used by farmers and gatherers to drop off their harvests.

ThingDef.Name: LWM_Hayloft
ThingDef.label: Hayloft
ThingDef.description: This structure can be used to store hay, silage, and various other plant materials off of damp floors. You probably want to build it under a (very tall) roof.

ThingDef.Name: Shelf
ThingDef.label: Clothing Rack
ThingDef.description: A rack for storing clothing for easy, quick access and a tidy room. Is not protected from the elements.

ThingDef.Name: SmallClothingRack
ThingDef.label: Small Clothing Rack
ThingDef.description: A rack for storing clothing for easy, quick access and a tidy room. Is not protected from the elements. Hold considerably less than the larger version, but good for displaying.

ThingDef.label: root cellar
ThingDef.description: A cellar dug into the ground to keep produce cool and dry. Reduces spoilage by 40%. Slow to store and retrieve items, since it takes a bit of time to "root" around in there. Can store up to 27 items but takes of 3x3 space.

ThingDef.Name: BarShelf
ThingDef.label: Mounted Bar Shelf
ThingDef.description: Shelves attached to a wall for storing bottles and jars. Perfect for that crampt space behind a bar.

ThingDef.label: Tow Sack
ThingDef.description: A woven bag for filling with rice, potatoes, sand, assorted lengths of wire, etc. Quick to use if you only fill it with one kind of thing. Reduces spoilage by 25%.

ThingDef.Name: LWM_MealRack
ThingDef.label: serving table
ThingDef.description: This is a smaller tall tray rack; haulers carry meals and treats here for storage.

ThingDef.label: food display counter
ThingDef.description: A glass case for displaying meals, baked goods, or even drugs, and helps keep them fresh longer.

ThingDef.Name: LWM_Medicine_Cabinet
ThingDef.label: Medicine Cabinet
ThingDef.description: A set of cabinets and shelves for stocking medicines and drugs. Recommended: keep an eye on children.

ThingDef.Name: LWM_WeaponsCabinet
ThingDef.label: Weapons Cabinet
ThingDef.description: A sturdy cabinet for storing multiple weapons. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.Name: LWM_WeaponsLocker
ThingDef.label: Weapons Locker
ThingDef.description: A high-capacity metal locker for securely storing many weapons. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.label: ammo box
ThingDef.description: Stores ammos; prevents deterioration. Up to 8 items.

ThingDef.label: armored ammo box
ThingDef.description: Stores and protects ammo; prevents deterioration. Up to 8 items.

ThingDef.label: armored box
ThingDef.description: Stores weapons, weapon parts, weapon crates, ammo and apparel; prevents deterioration. Up to 8 items.

ThingDef.label: Textile rack
ThingDef.description: Bins and hangers for storing bolts of textile.

ThingDef.label: wardrobe
ThingDef.description: A place for colonists to organize their clothes. Complete with decorative skull, which doesn't help you sleep any better.
